item.title: Video Editor for Training Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to take pre-recorded training videos and enhance them with visually appealing graphics and effects. The videos are approximately 5-10 minutes long and require editing, packaging, and adding necessary visuals to make them more engaging and informative. The ideal candidate must have experience in video editing software and possess a creative eye for visual storytelling. Attention to detail and the ability to maintain a consistent style throughout the videos is essential. Strong communication skills and the ability to work efficiently with minimal supervision are also required.

   Skills required:
   - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Knowledge of motion graphics and visual effects
   - Understanding of video formats and compression techniques
   - Attention to detail and ability to maintain a consistent style
   - Strong communication skills and ability to work independently

   This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can deliver high-quality edited videos within the given timeframe.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 10:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Production
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: 3 Day Video Shoot - Available for UK Applicants Only - Upwork
item.description:
Video Shoot Required Engaging Facebook & Instagram Ads

Let's go viral baby!! We sell beds of nails and made a viral ad recently

https://www.instagram.com/p/CzkgnZYNhuZ/#advertiser

I've written scripts and storyboards for 10 more like it and am seeking a talented videographer to join me in Bath, Bristol or London -  wherever's easiest for you.

Only open for people available to shoot between the 1st August and the 7th August. We'll spend a few days shooting together and then I'd ask you to package this up for our editor who will edit the footage.

Responsibilities:

Shoot epic footage that align with our brand identity and marketing objectives.

Prepare all raw footage for our Shakti editor

Ensure that the ads are shot & optimized for Facebook and Instagram.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a videographer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your skills and creativity.
- Familiarity with the nuances of shooting for social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram.
- Excellent attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members remotely.

We're looking for shooting in that first week of August in London, Bath or Bristol (or anywhere close by). Excited to see your application!

Hourly Range: $33.00-$130.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:43 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Camera, Video Production
Country: New Zealand
click to apply

item.title: Experienced video editor of weddings to edit a 3 min epic teaser and a 25 min chronological video. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi :)

I'm looking for a video editor for weddings videos, the weddings are going to be in english or french and I would like someone that works with Davinci Resolve or FCP X.

Here is the job details :
- I will provide the raw footages to cull (around 150-200 GB to download) and music options
- I need a dynamic and cinematic 3 minute epic and dramatic teaser.
- I need you to edit the 25 minutes long video.

⚠️ The 25 minutes video need to be edited in a linear, chronological fashion, with no mixing of the day (meaning you use the files in alphabetical order, you don't mix the dance with the ceremony for examples) if you don't do that, if you mix everything up I will not pay you ! ⚠️

Here is my website for inspiration: https://aigal.ch

Please be aware that your are not able to publish the videos on your own platforms except if I gave the authorization.

Only contact me if you are working with Davinci Resolve or FCP X please :)

Let me know if you have any question :)
Best,

Emeric

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wedding & Event Video, Color Grading, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, French
Skills: Wedding & Event Video, Color Grading, DaVinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, French
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.description:
We are in search of a skilled CapCut video editor to join our team. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage to create captivating videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of CapCut software and be able to work independently to bring creative ideas to life. Attention to detail, strong storytelling skills, and the ability to meet deadlines are essential for this role.

item.title: Creative Video Ad for Outsourcing Tech Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are currently seeking a highly skilled video editor to produce an engaging and captivating video advertisement for our outsourcing tech company. Our primary objective is to present our services in a manner that is both exciting and innovative. The video ad should effectively showcase the advantages of partnering with our company and effectively communicate our unique value proposition. We are searching for an individual who can infuse the project with creativity and originality, all while comprehending the needs of our target audience and industry. The ideal candidate must possess expertise in video editing, motion graphics, and storytelling techniques.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop a visually appealing and attention-grabbing video advertisement for our outsourcing tech company.
- Emphasize the benefits of collaborating with our company and effectively communicate our unique value proposition.
- Utilize creative and original approaches to make the video ad engaging and exciting.
- Comprehend and cater to the needs and preferences of our target audience and industry.
- Employ video editing, motion graphics, and storytelling techniques to effectively convey our message.

Requirements:
- Proficient in video editing software and tools.
- Strong skills in motion graphics design and implementation.
- Ability to effectively tell a story through video.
- Demonstrates exceptional creativity and originality.
- Meticulous attention to detail.
- Comprehensive understanding of our target audience and industry.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Egypt
click to apply

item.title: Video editor/animator needed for simple Meta ad videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

We're a leading on demand laundry and dry cleaning business looking for a talented video editor for this short term project.

Our goal is to create a dynamic advertisement using an 'iMessage text exchange' format to promote our service through what appears to be an organic text conversation between friends.

Project Overview:
We aim to produce a series of three ad variants, each focusing on a different aspect of our service:

1. Bedding/Laundry
2. Dry Cleaning a Suit
3. Laundry Service Wash for Clothes

The scripts for these ads are complete, and all image assets have been prepared. We need a skilled video editor to emulate the iMessage visual template and animate the text messages to mimic the natural look and feel of a phone conversation between friends talking about the service.

Responsibilities:
-Create a dynamic ad following the provided 'iMessage text exchange' script.
-Emulate the iMessage visual template, ensuring realistic animation of text messages, image pops, and screen scrolls.
Incorporate provided image assets into the ad seamlessly.
-Ensure the final videos align with our brand's visual style and quality standards.

Requirements:
-Proven experience in video editing, with a portfolio showcasing similar work.
-Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects).
-Attention to detail and ability to accurately replicate the iMessage visual style.
-Strong communication skills and ability to meet deadlines.

Please find an example of the phone template below for iPhone iMessage.

To apply, please provide your portfolio and any similar work that you have done.

The deadline is Monday 1st of July, but if you can have it completed earlier that would be great so we can offer feedback and make any necessary edits.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Video Ad Designer for Sports Betting Website - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and experienced Facebook video ad designer to create engaging and compelling video ads for our sports betting website. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their expertise in video ad design, with a focus on sports-related content.

Key responsibilities:
- Collaborate with our marketing team to conceptualize and develop video ad concepts
- Design and animate video ads that effectively communicate our brand message and promote our sports betting services
- Ensure the ad content adheres to legal and regulatory guidelines

Requirements:
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
- Solid understanding of motion graphics and visual effects
- Strong knowledge of the sports betting industry and its trends
- Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines

If you are passionate about sports and have a knack for creating visually stunning video ads, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to showcase your skills and contribute to the success of our sports betting website.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 09:22 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Web Design, Adobe Illustrator, Web Development
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Web Design, Adobe Illustrator, Web Development
Country: Cyprus
click to apply
